name: Surgical Mask
description: A surgical mask is used for personal protection by mostly healthcare activists. It is important to choose the best manufacturer as a low quality mask can be very harmful for your health.

name: Rubber Gloves
description: The Rubber Gloves are used by doctors when they do surgery. A good pair of rubber gloves are very much important for the doctor and his patient. We have been providing synthetic rubber gloves for years.

name: Oxygen Mask
description: An oxygen mask is a an emergency kit that helps transferring fresh oxygen from a storage to the lungs. A finest oxygen mask can save life while a cheap mask can lead one to death.
